text.div:
SHR NonLabObservationStatusVS ValueSet

Whether the observation is complete and definite. The set of values is a subset of status values associated with lab tests.

name: SHR NonLabObservationStatusVS ValueSet
title: SHR NonLabObservationStatusVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Whether the observation is complete and definite. The set of values is a subset of status values associated with lab tests.

concept.display: This is an initial or interim observation: data may be incomplete or unverified.
The observation has been modified subsequent to being final.
